title: How to Make Spicy Apricot Dipping Sauce

methods.name: Spicy apricot and mustard dipping sauce

steps.headline: Mix all of the ingredients together in a small bowl.
Serve.
steps.description:
Place the bowl out for dipping. This mixture is suitable for dipping kebabs, meatballs, veggie balls and so forth. It also makes a great sauce for burgers, including veggie burgers. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a3\/Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a3\/Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

methods.name: Spicy apricot and ginger dipping sauce

steps.headline: Place all of the ingredients into a small bowl.
Serve.
steps.description: Place the bowl out for dipping. See serving suggestions under Method 1.

methods.name: Spicy apricot and cayenne dipping sauce

steps.headline: Add the apricot preserves and ginger powder to a small bowl.
Add the chile flakes and cayenne to taste.
Add sufficient water to make the dipping sauce the right consistency.
steps.description: Add the water gradually, stirring constantly.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Place the bowl out for dipping. See Method 1 for serving suggestions.

methods.name: Spicy apricot and horseradish dipping sauce

steps.headline: Place the three ingredients into a small bowl.
Serve.
steps.description: Place the bowl out for dipping. See serving suggestions under Method 1.

tyn: Small bowl suitable for direct serving
text:
Spicy apricot and mustard dipping sauce Mix all of the ingredients together in a small bowl. Stir until well combined. Serve. Place the bowl out for dipping. This mixture is suitable for dipping kebabs, meatballs, veggie balls and so forth. It also makes a great sauce for burgers, including veggie burgers. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a3\/Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a3\/Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Spicy apricot and ginger dipping sauce Place all of the ingredients into a small bowl. Stir together to combine well. Serve. Place the bowl out for dipping. See serving suggestions under Method 1. Spicy apricot and cayenne dipping sauce Add the apricot preserves and ginger powder to a small bowl. Add the chile flakes and cayenne to taste. Adjust as required after tasting. Add sufficient water to make the dipping sauce the right consistency. Add the water gradually, stirring constantly. Serve. Place the bowl out for dipping. See Method 1 for serving suggestions. Spicy apricot and horseradish dipping sauce Place the three ingredients into a small bowl. Mix well to combine. Serve. Place the bowl out for dipping. See serving suggestions under Method 1.
sentences: Spicy apricot and mustard dipping sauce Mix all of the ingredients together in a small bowl.
Stir until well combined.
Serve.
Place the bowl out for dipping.
This mixture is suitable for dipping kebabs, meatballs, veggie balls and so forth.
It also makes a great sauce for burgers, including veggie burgers.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a3\/Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a3\/Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Spicy-Apricot-Dipping-Sauce-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Spicy apricot and ginger dipping sauce Place all of the ingredients into a small bowl.
Stir together to combine well.
Serve.
Place the bowl out for dipping.
See serving suggestions under Method 1.
Spicy apricot and cayenne dipping sauce Add the apricot preserves and ginger powder to a small bowl.
Add the chile flakes and cayenne to taste.
Adjust as required after tasting.
Add sufficient water to make the dipping sauce the right consistency.
Add the water gradually, stirring constantly.
Serve.
Place the bowl out for dipping.
See Method 1 for serving suggestions.
Spicy apricot and horseradish dipping sauce Place the three ingredients into a small bowl.
Mix well to combine.
Serve.
Place the bowl out for dipping.
See serving suggestions under Method 1.
